author: mheath
msg: Refactored to use MINA idle mechanism for timeout check.

author: dfabulich
msg: [SUREFIRE-445] Include Manifest-Version attribute, as required by spec

author: jdcasey
msg: [MNG-1493] Adding integration test verifying that modules specifying alternative pom-file names are allowed, in addition to the older-style module specs where only the dir name was referenced, and a 'pom.xml' file was expected within.

author: jdcasey
msg: [MNG-1493] Porting fix from trunk revId: 618780 back to 2.0.x branch. This permits <module>dir/pom-alt.xml</module> syntax, instead of being limited to just the dir name and implied pom.xml filename.
